name: Drag 'n' Jump
description:
Drag ‘n’ Jump is the funniest online car racing game ever. Compete against your friends and other real players in online tournaments and rank higher than your rivals to earn huge battle rewards!

Drag ‘n’ Jump is a free action game about driving faster, jumping higher and landing better than your friends. Easy to play, hard to master!

Drive fast like a crazy stunt man, shift gears perfectly and use nitro boost to reach illegal speeds. Then climb a hill to jump sky high. Do not crash and you will be the king of the rankings!

Upgrade your vehicle and jump farther in the arena to reach the top of the daily leaderboards. Fun action!

DRAG ‘N’ JUMP GAME FEATURES:
- Multiplayer game with online leaderboards.
- Real and live opponents to race in epic battles.
- Crazy and fun physics
- Upgrade your sports car. Feel free to get as far as possible!
